application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 5 (Access Ramp) of planning permission ref. 4058/APP/2021/3650, dated 09-09-2022 (External air conditioning plant to be enclosed within a timber plant enclosure, replacement of external ramp, repair and restoration of all windows throughout and installation of secondary glazing and replacement of damaged windows and doors, repointing of existing brickwork to be repointing where damaged and repainting to match existing, replacement of existing round rooflight like for like. Internal reconfiguration comprising the installation of demountable partition walls, removal of partition walls, replacement of non-original doors with fire doors).
